comments.author: trendcoin
comments.body: This question sounds like a direct request for investment advice. In such situations, I always try to make sentences that are not precise because I do not feel comfortable. We have been reading reports that there are very frequent errors in the Solana network. If you do a little google search, you can read a lot of news on the subject. Also a major problem is that FTX has huge amounts of SOL. They may be selling SOL to meet withdrawal requests. It won't suffer the same fate as FTT because we're talking about a big blockchain with products on it, but I think investing in this coin involves too much risk. If I wanted to invest in this coin, I would choose to risk with only a small portion of my money. I wish you good luck...
